mapper.update: UPDATE offline_pay_history SET stock_issued = 1, updated_at = SYSDATE WHERE offline_pay_history_id = #{offlinePayHistoryId}
mapper.select: SELECT offline_pay_history_id AS offlinePayHistoryId, shop_id AS shopId, card_company_id AS cardCompanyId, card_number_last4 AS cardNumberLast4, total_price AS totalPrice, barcode, stock_issued AS stockIssued FROM offline_pay_history WHERE barcode = #{barcode}
